Flurry Cover Art

Cover art for an up-and-coming Montreal rapper.

Cover art for the song ‘Flurry’ by C47eb

Listen to C47eb on Spotify

The process

Nothing is more satisfying than working on a project about something you love. I’m a big rap listener so creating cover art for a rap song is super fun.

I started the cover with a photo of C47eb and a general direction, and the rest was up to me.
